summary: A woman in search of her missing sister uncovers a Satanic cult in New York's Greenwich Village, and finds that they may have something to do with her sibling's random disappearance.
cast: Tom Conway|Jean Brooks|Isabel Jewell|Kim Hunter|Evelyn Brent|Erford Gage|Ben Bard|Hugh Beaumont|Chef Milani|Marguerita Sylva|Joan Barclay|Patti Brill|Wally Brown|Feodor Chaliapin Jr.|Wheaton Chambers|James Conaty|Edith Conrad|Kernan Cripps|Richard Davies|Dan Dowling|Lorna Dunn|Edythe Elliott|Bud Geary|Barbara Hale|William Halligan|Mary Halsey|Henry Hebert|Lloyd Ingraham|Tiny Jones|Milton Kibbee|Adia Kuznetzoff|Lou Lubin|Eve March|Howard M.
